title: Inflation NOT The Poor's Fault!? America's Amazing Disappearing Covid Tests 11.23.21
itunes:title: Inflation NOT The Poor's Fault!? America's Amazing Disappearing Covid Tests 11.23.21
description:
In episode 1036, Jack and Miles are joined by TV writer Anna Salinas to discuss Inflation? It’s called profiteering!, Thanksgiving Highlights America’s Rapid Test Quagmire and more!

  1. Inflation? It’s called profiteering!
  2. Thanksgiving Highlights America’s Rapid Test Quagmire
  3. Here’s Why Rapid COVID Tests Are So Expensive and Hard to Find
  4. Why is the FDA Funded in Part by the Companies It Regulates?
  5. Where Are All the At-Home COVID Tests?
  6. Why You Can’t Find Cheap At-Home COVID Tests


Listen: Love That Never - IMANU Remix

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
